IX.iii.1.D.1.e
.
COLA
If Social Security benefits are increased as a result of a Social Security cost-of-living adjustment (COLA), Parents’ DIC income limits and rates are increased also.  Not all beneficiaries get an increase as a result of the COLA.
Example
:  A beneficiary who is receiving the minimum monthly rate of $5 may continue to receive $5 per month.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Authorization
